hero.title: Hi, I'm Zayd Inani, a Passionate Developer from Beautiful Morocco
hero.text: Passionately committed to turning ideas into reality using the language of code, while adding a touch of elegant design to create experiences that captivate.

about.title: About Me
about.text: I am Zayd Inani, a self-taught full stack developer and an English Literature graduate from the University of Abdelmalek Essaadi. Hailing from Morocco, I have always nurtured a profound curiosity for technology. The allure of crafting imaginative solutions as a developer, coupled with the ever-present challenges, has been a passion of mine.
about.secondaryText: Continuously seeking growth, I strive to refine my skills not only as a developer but also as an individual. I welcome you to connect with me through my social media channels or email. Your ideas are an inspiration, and I'm eager to collaborate in bringing them to vibrant life.

skills.title: Skills
skills.text: My skill set is a culmination of various tools and technologies that enable me to craft digital experiences. I'm well-versed in both front-end and back-end development. My focus lies in creating elegant and efficient solutions that seamlessly blend functionality with aesthetics.

skillSlide.title: HTMl
skillSlide.description: Forms the basis of web pages, delivering vital structure and layout to arrange content, allowing information to be displayed in a user-friendly manner.

skillSlide.title: CSS
skillSlide.description: Enhances web content design, managing visual aesthetics and layout to ensure a cohesive appearance.

skillSlide.title: JavaScript
skillSlide.description: Drives interactivity and dynamic behavior on websites, enabling responsive user experiences through real-time content modifications.

skillSlide.title: WordPress
skillSlide.description: open-source platform for creating and managing websites, known for its user-friendly interface and customizable features through themes and plugins.

skillSlide.title: React
skillSlide.description: widely-used JavaScript library for building user interfaces that are dynamic and responsive.

skillSlide.title: NodeJs
skillSlide.description: Executes JavaScript server-side, enabling scalable web applications with non-blocking I/O capabilities.

skillSlide.title: ExpressJS
skillSlide.description: Streamlines Node.js development with a flexible and efficient web application framework.

skillSlide.title: Vue
skillSlide.description: A progressive JavaScript framework celebrated for its simplicity and flexibility, enabling developers to build interactive and dynamic user interfaces with ease.

skillSlide.title: Laravel
skillSlide.description: A dynamic web development framework in PHP, characterized by its elegant syntax and integrated features that enhance efficiency and code quality.

skillSlide.title: GitHub
skillSlide.description: Offers version control, collaboration, and code management functionalities for developers.

skillSlide.title: GIT
skillSlide.description: Distributed version control system aiding code tracking and collaborative project management.

skillSlide.title: BootStrap
skillSlide.description: Front-end framework simplifying responsive web design with pre-designed components.

skillSlide.title: SASS
skillSlide.description: Extends CSS with features like variables and nesting, enhancing styling efficiency.

skillSlide.title: MySQL
skillSlide.description: Popular relational database system for storing and managing data.

skillSlide.title: MongoDB
skillSlide.description: NoSQL database system that stores data in a flexible, JSON-like format, making it ideal for handling large volumes of data

skillSlide.title: PHP
skillSlide.description: Server-side scripting language for creating dynamic web pages.

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: I present the results of my imaginative thinking and technical expertise. This collection showcases the solutions I've built and the experiences I've designed. Each project demonstrates my dedication to excellence, blending the latest technology with creative design.

features.title: Enhancing Your Experience
features.text: In this dynamic world of development, I strive to provide a seamless experience that encapsulates speed, intuition, responsiveness, and dynamism. These features are at the heart of my approach, ensuring that your projects are brought to life with the highest level of expertise.

feature.title: fast
feature.description: With efficiency as my guide, I ensure your concepts materialize promptly without compromising quality. Timely delivery and excellence go hand in hand.

feature.title: Intuitive
feature.description: Your unique needs are my focus. By deeply comprehending your objectives, I craft solutions that seamlessly align with your goals, creating outcomes that truly resonate.

feature.title: Responsive
feature.description: In an era of diverse devices, your projects will seamlessly adjust to various screens. From desktops to mobiles, your audience will enjoy a consistent and user-friendly experience.

feature.title: Dynamic
feature.description: The digital landscape evolves, and so do my creations. By integrating dynamic elements, I build projects ready to embrace emerging technologies, ensuring your solutions remain relevant.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.text: Your thoughts, questions, and ideas matter to me. I'm here to listen and collaborate. Whether you're looking to start a new project, discuss potential collaborations, or simply want to say hello, Reach out, and let's begin an exciting conversation that could lead to something remarkable. Your vision is important, and I'm eager to help bring it to life.
